# F3065-300259: Liferaft Certification and Spare Parts Service

## General Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4158971516-Doc4162194820
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Publication Date**: August 29, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 15, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: September 30, 2026

## Invitation to Bid

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issues this Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) for the provision of liferaft certification and spare parts services. Bidders will be selected on a competitive basis.

## Service Requirements

The successful bidder will provide certification services and supply spare parts for HURRICANE ZODIAC and DUNLOP-BEAUFORT (DBC) liferafts, as well as Recovery Systems, located in the Quebec province. Bidders are required to consult Annex A for detailed service requirements.

## Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will be conducted on the basis of lowest price. Bidders must submit bids electronically and will be required to meet all requirements specified in the tender package.

## Business Requirements

*  **Trade Agreements**: Suppliers must comply with the obligations set forth in the trade agreements associated with this RFSO.
*  **Other**: Bidders are required to review and acknowledge the Terms and Conditions and the Intellectual Property Commercial Agreement to take part in this lifecycle.
